thread.title: Otto Porter Jr. turns a layup into a must-see play
thread.title_full: Otto Porter Jr. turns a layup into a must-see play

title: Otto Porter Jr. turns a layup into a must-see play
text:
By Clinton Yates October 12 at 11:30 AM Follow @clintonyates 
Even as a mistake, Otto Porter Jr. just made one of the best plays of the preseason. In a matchup Sunday at Verizon Center against Bauru, a Brazilian team, the third-year swingman from Georgetown, he pulled off quite the dribbling exhibition and even finished the play with a rather nice finger roll. 
The are two things to note here: 
This was a nicely aggressive move even without the Harlem Globetrotter move, that might have led to a pretty nasty dunk. 
But what makes this extra funny is Drew Gooden III’s reaction, who even off the initial fumble is out of his seat with his hands on his head, and then just starts screaming jubilantly in Porter’s face when the bucket finally drops. 
The look of exsaperation on Bauru No. 23’s face ties the clip up nicely. Clinton Yates is a D.C. native and an online columnist. When he's not covering the city, pop culture or listening to music, he watches sports. A lot of them. sports Success! Check your inbox for details.
